name: Wild Fox Simulator Real 3D
description:
WILD FOX SIMULATOR REAL 3D and ultimate fun and amazing simulator experience.

Wild Fox is angry and running to catch apple for his partner who is stone and need Magical Orbs. Help wolf Catch Orbs and Free his partner.

You need to make Fox run faster before his power runs out. Catch apples and boost your energy. Once you have collected the magical orbs, you need to rush towards the fox partner so she can get free.

WOW! time is short and fox is getting angry. He wants you to move him fast and catch orbs for his partner.
